title: Next Blue Origin tourist launch will fly wheelchair user to space for 1st time
description: Blue Origin's next space tourist launch will make history, sending a wheelchair user to the final frontier for the first time.
content: Blue Origin's next space tourist launch will make history, sending a wheelchair user to the final frontier for the first time.
